result.reason: UI acceptance test automation is a large infrastructure project that requires selecting a test framework, setting up CI integration, and creating test harnesses - this is ongoing project work tracked separately in the test coverage analysis, not a discrete fixable issue.
result.approach: UI acceptance tests are already being addressed incrementally through the RunWithMessagePump pattern and existing test infrastructure; a dedicated automation framework (Appium/WinAppDriver) would be a major initiative better tracked as a roadmap item rather than a single issue fix.
